about_the_game:
Slay deadly vampires, craft a powerful deck and combine the effects of ancient relics in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Fight your way though the once holy land of Umbratica in order to purge it from the curse that has taken over it.


Precise no-RNG tactical turn-based combat: Deploy your squad of vampire slayers in a series of fast-paced grid-based combats. Purge this land from the ghouls, fiends and other deadly monstrosities that inhabit the night!

Strategic roguelike deckbuilding: Your squad abilities are determined by your deck! So as you make your way through the cursed land of Umbratica you’ll gather new cards. You’ll use these as the attacks, actions and abilities of your squad in combat!

Deeply customizable playstyle: As you play each run you’ll have several options over the way your squad fights. First you’ll the select the heroes that’ll go in your journey, each has their own set of available cards! As your journey progresses you’ll find different cards and you’ll upgrade them to further customize your playstyle, you’ll find powerful ancient relics that affect the functioning of the whole squad, and also mysterious items that can boost (and nerf) individual hero’s stats and also add special status during combat. Strategically combine all of these elements to fully express your playstyle!

Roguelike run generation: Each time you dare to adventure into the gothic land of Umbratica the layout will be different. Different combat stages and rewards, different text-based events, different cards, relics and items. No two runs are the same!

short_description: A roguelike deckbuilding tactics game that combines the precise tactical combat of “Into the Breach” and the strategic deck crafting of “Slay the Spire”. Lead a squad of vampire slayers as they banish the fiendish creatures that have taken over of the cursed land of Umbratica.
